Uses of Interface
org.apache.batik.svggen.ExtensionHandler

Packages that use ExtensionHandler
org.apache.batik.svggen Provides an API on top of the AbstractGraphics2D to translate Java 2D primitives into the SVG format. 
 

Uses of ExtensionHandler in org.apache.batik.svggen
 

Classes in org.apache.batik.svggen that implement ExtensionHandler
 class DefaultExtensionHandler
          This implementation of the ExtensionHandler interface always returns null Nodes.
